title.narrative: Port-City of Limon Integrated Infrastructure Project

description.narrative: The Objective of the project is to: (i) improve the protection and management of Limon's cultural and natural heritage; (ii) increase access to the sewage system and reduce urban flooding in the area of Limoncito; (iii) foster a more efficient, accountable and credible local government; (iv) create new employment opportunities through small and micro-enterprises; and (v) support the port modernization process and improve freight transport access to the port terminals.

condition.narrative: Disbursement: Signing of the other implementation agreements for the respective subcomponents.
Disbursement:Approval by the Bank of the Manual for the Local Economic Development Component.
Effectiveness: Signing of the agreement for the implementation of the flood control works, or of the sewerage works.
Effectiveness: The PCU and Advisory Committee will be established under terms of reference agreed with the Bank.
